meanings.definition: A clause at the foot of an affidavit showing when, where, and before whom it was sworn.
meanings.sent1: The jurat on the document indicated the date and location of the swearing.
meanings.sent2: The lawyer carefully examined the jurat on the affidavit.
meanings.sent3: The jurat on the paper seemed to wink at the notary public.
meanings.sent4: Her signature on the jurat was like a seal of truth.
meanings.sent5: The jurat stood out boldly at the bottom of the legal form.

meanings.definition: A certificate on an affidavit showing when, where, and before whom it was sworn.
meanings.sent1: The jurat confirmed the details of the sworn statement.
meanings.sent2: The notary public stamped the jurat with the official seal.
meanings.sent3: The jurat on the document wore a tiny top hat for added formality.
meanings.sent4: His reputation was the jurat that gave weight to his words.
meanings.sent5: The jurat gleamed with authority, making the affidavit official.
